title: The Travelers
description: I’m a traveler which means I’m a shifter that travels around the country. Since I’m a half breed, no pack will accept me because of my impure blood. I attend a different school every year and this year is my final year. After that, I am out of here and plan to live quietly in the human world and away from the shifter drama. That is until one blonde shifter rocks my I am part of the elite shifter back called the Clovis. Together with Ethan, Leo, and Andrew, we rule wolf packs from Colorado to Maine. Ethan, my Alpha has found our true mate and when I meet her, I am confused as to why I’m not attracted to her. Don’t get me wrong, she’s gorgeous and smells great, but I’m just not feeling it. Especially when I have a run in with the cutest little redheaded traveler. I know it’s taboo to hang out with a traveler, but I just can’t help myself. If my pack found out, they would send her away and I am not about to let that happen. Even though I know that we will mate with our destined mate next summer, I plan to have as much fun as I can with my red headed beauty. But first, I have to convince her. This is a reverse harem, slow burn novel. There are sex scenes including M/M.
author: Anne Marie Stone
